body: the fat guy is not her bf, he came for the rumor "the girl is a slut that she would fuck anyone", then the fat guy overheard the girl is actually a virgin and decided to rape her.
Mmmm. It's vanilla because if I get it right the big guy is the bf but when you rape your own lover any possible ntr situation is destroyed.
I believe this is still "vanilla" since it have a "happy end" in the last page.....But seriously is it call Reverse NTR? Cause as far as I know there is no Anti-NTR right?
What do you even call this? Anti-NTR? Counter NTR? Reverse UNO Card NTR?
